package.name: Crypt_Blowfish
package.summary: Allows for quick two-way blowfish encryption without requiring the Mcrypt PHP extension.
package.description: This package allows you to prefore two-way blowfish on the fly using only PHP. This package does not require the Mcrypt PHP extension to work.

release.notes: * Increased encryption and decryption speed * init() method is now private * Removed unnesessary defines * Deprecated isReady() method
* Increased encryption and decryption speed * init() method is now private * Removed unnesessary defines * Deprecated isReady() method
